AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

description: Non Material Amendment to Planning Permission 20/01307/HOU (Erection of two storey side and single storey rear extension) for addition of rear dormer roof extension to proposed side extension.
decision_conditions: The Council considers the amendments to be material and as such, it is recommended that a S96A application for a non-material amendment is refused.

Householder Checklist Update - Please ensure you have provided all documents required to support your application in line with the Householder Local List and update the Checklist document with any changes you have made to your application. E.g. you have now provided 45 degree drawings, but this is incorrect on the Checklist. Please give clear reasons if not providing mandatory documents.
